reply.question: Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of various types of personal data, including identity and contact data, communications data, financial transaction data, technical data, profile data, usage data, marketing and communications data, subscription data, and sensitive personal data, among others.
answer.simple_answer: Yes, the app collects various types of personal data.

extended_simple_answer.comment: The privacy policy outlines the specific types of personal data collected.
extended_simple_answer.content: The app collects personal data such as identity and contact data, communications data, financial transaction data, technical data, profile data, usage data, marketing and communications data, subscription data, and sensitive personal data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects a wide range of personal data from users, which is essential for providing its services.

reply.question: If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects various types of Personal Data, which include: Identity and Contact Data (billing address, delivery address, location, email address, telephone numbers, and subscription details), Communications Data (interactions via social media, email, and other communications), Counselors’ Data (title, full name, clinic locations, expertise, symptoms, procedures, languages spoken, education, and qualifications), Financial Transaction Data (bank account and payment card details, payment history, and consultation details), Technical Data (IP address, login data, browser type, device settings, and location), Profile Data (username, password, transactions, interests, preferences, feedback, and survey responses), Usage Data (how the Platform is used), Marketing and Communications Data (preferences for marketing communications), Subscription Data (subscription details), and Sensitive Personal Data (gender, sexual orientation, race, religion, health reports with explicit consent).
answer.simple_answer: The app collects Identity and Contact Data, Communications Data, Counselors’ Data, Financial Transaction Data, Technical Data, Profile Data, Usage Data, Marketing and Communications Data, Subscription Data, and Sensitive Personal Data.

extended_simple_answer.comment: The app collects a wide range of personal data to enhance user experience and provide services.
extended_simple_answer.content: Types of data collected include personal identification, communication details, financial information, technical data, user preferences, and sensitive information with consent.

reply.question: Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use. It outlines that personal data is collected to provide and improve the services offered through the platform, to process transactions, and to communicate with users regarding their interactions with the platform.
answer.simple_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

extended_simple_answer.comment: The privacy policy specifies that personal data is used for various purposes including service provision and user communication.
extended_simple_answer.content: The Privacy Policy states that Takalam processes Personal Data based on explicit user consent, legitimate interests, and legal obligations, and it is used to provide and improve services.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the purposes for which personal data is collected, ensuring transparency for users regarding how their data will be used.
reply.reference: The Privacy Policy outlines the foundation upon which any personal data that Takalam collects from you will be processed in connection with your use of the Platform and the Services.

reply.question: Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users have the right to access, rectify, and delete their data, as well as to object to certain data processing activities. Takalam processes Personal Data based on explicit user consent, and users can withdraw their consent at any time.
answer.simple_answer: Yes, users can delete their data and opt out of data collection.

extended_simple_answer.comment: Users are encouraged to contact Takalam for any queries regarding their data.
extended_simple_answer.content: Users have rights under UAE and ADGM data protection laws, including the right to delete their data and opt out of data collection.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can exercise their rights regarding their personal data, including deletion and opting out of data collection.
reply.reference: The User Agreement and Privacy Policy section.

reply.question: Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No, Takalam does not sell, share, rent, or lease any personally identifiable information or credit/debit card details to third parties. Takalam will not pass any debit/credit card details to third parties without explicit consent.
answer.simple_answer: No, the app does not share data with third parties.

extended_simple_answer.comment: Takalam is committed to protecting user privacy and does not share personal data with third parties.
extended_simple_answer.content: All credit/debit card details and personally identifiable information will NOT be, sold, shared, rented, or leased to any third parties. Takalam will not pass any debit/credit card details to third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that Takalam does not share personal data with third parties, ensuring user privacy and data protection.
reply.reference: All credit/debit card details and personally identifiable information will NOT be, sold, shared, rented, or leased to any third parties.

reply.question: If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app does not share personal data with third parties. It explicitly states that all credit/debit card details and personally identifiable information will NOT be sold, shared, rented, or leased to any third parties. Takalam will not pass any debit/credit card details to third parties.
answer.simple_answer: The app does not share data with third parties.

extended_simple_answer.comment: The privacy policy emphasizes the commitment to user privacy and the protection of personal data.
extended_simple_answer.content: All credit/debit card details and personally identifiable information will NOT be sold, shared, rented, or leased to any third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines that Takalam does not engage in sharing personal data with third parties, reinforcing their commitment to user privacy.
reply.reference: Section: 'All credit/debit card details and financial information may be recorded and stored by Takalam, subject to your explicit consent. All credit/debit card details and personally identifiable information will NOT be, sold, shared, rented, or leased to any third parties.'
